page.title: 11Shopping.
page.content: There are only two shops in Biggin:_ 1.{The Post Office. As well as the usual services, magazines and papers can be bought at the Post Office. 2.{Polly's Cafe. Polly's is a general store as well as a cafe. Four{mobile shops}come to the village. On a Friday the Fish van comes.There are two greengrocer vans. One calls on a Tuesday and the other on a Friday.On Mondays and Thursday the general store van comes. On a Sunday the Ice cream van comes. Most people do their main shopping in Ashbourne,Buxton,Bakewell or Matlock. Occasionally people go to Hartington to shop.
